overview: The delayed live broadcast room is now online! You can feel the scene of @泽野弘之_nZk without leaving home! There is also a special sponsorship of the mobile game @手机战队 The official OP "Sea of Fire" and ED "N01R" will be released on-site for the first time! At 18:30 on the evening of October 13th @哔哩哔哩生 Broadcast Exclusive live broadcast, let's meet in the live room and call for Zeye together~  Sawano Hiroyuki LIVE [nZk] in Shanghai 2019 190914 Mercedes-Benz Arena (Shanghai)
title: Sawano Hiroyuki LIVE [nZk] in Shanghai 2019
